00149         /* The following functions must not be called by an application.       */
00150         /* They are the entry point from the stack callback functions into our */
00151         /* object orientated framework (APOXI).                                */
00152         /* They are implemented as static because they have to be passed as    */
00153         /* normal C function pointers. The reason for this is the BT-API Stack */
00154         /* interface that demands C function pointers for callback the         */

00156         /* operations                                                          */
